timeline.bodyText:
why is this size 3? You created one superadmin user and one non-superadmin above, right?
Also please verify the values of users[1] and users[2] below too
timeline.author: saminguyen

replies.bodyText:
We have used your suggested approach to assert bad request violations in other places, but here some of the fields are dynamically generated so we are using andExpect() to assert the values. The only thing that I could assert is the admin email ids,
Here, the size is 3 because 2 admins are created in this test method and another one is created in @BeforeEach method.
replies.author: chiranjibi009

timeline.message: email ids are asserted for shouldReturnAdminsForGetAdmins test case method
